word:
The Word declares, "By thy words thou shalt be justified, and by thy words thou shalt be 
                                                                           129
condemned." Matthew 12:37. If our words act upon ourselves they act more powerfully upon others. There is great mischief done by words spoken. God alone knows and measures the result of a careless, exaggerated mode of speaking. There is much swearing done in spirit.--TMK 137.
